ygData.subject: Forage and Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Everyone knows that Bard forage caps at 40 right?  There is some concern floating about that a minimum skill of 100 in forage is required to get the new unique
ygData.messageBody:
Everyone knows that Bard forage caps at 40 right? There is some concern
floating about that a minimum skill of 100 in forage is required to get the
new unique items people are finding in the different zones.

I have a bit of good news, I foraged an "ash root" last night (I think it
was in Kithcor) and later foraged a normal "root" in HighKeep. They were
definitely separate items and did not stack with one another (much like the
old berries and fruit that have been around and have the same graphic).

Any other bards on this list found any of the unique new forage items yet
too?

BTW - my forage is maxed at the cap, 40.

- Faras
>
